page.title: 15Nercwys & Eryrys - Services
page.content: From this area children go to primary school in Llanarmon, Nercwys, Graianrhyd, or to welsh medium schools in Treuddyn or Mold. For secondary education, children go to Ruthun, Mold or Hope to either welsh or english medium schools. School buses go through the area to Ruthun and Mold. A mobile library visits the area once a fortnight, there is a youth club in Eryrys. For other activities people go out of the area. The one established Church of Wales in the area is St. Davids, Eryrys, built in 1864 on land given by the Dean of St. Asaph, said to be the most elevated church in Wales at 1,123ft. The north of the area is in the parish of St. Marys Church of Wales, Nercwys. Salem chapel, Eryrys is Wesleyan Methodist. Bresbyteraidd Cymru Soar chapel, Nercwys also serves the area.
